summary.span: 指定服務作業是否接受來自用戶端的傳入交易。

span.span: Specifies whether a service operation accepts incoming transactions from a client.
Enabling Transaction Flow

param.name: description
param.span: 屬性新增額外功能的作業說明。

span.span: The operation description for which the attribute adds extra functionality.

param.name: parameters
param.span: 繫結內容上的參數物件集合。

summary.span: 將額外參數 (設定) 新增至繫結內容以支援這個作業的行為。

span.span: Adds extra parameters (settings) to the binding context to support this operation's behavior.
This method cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供額外參數 (設定) 的繫結內容，以支援此作業所需的行為。This method provides a binding context with the extra parameters (settings) to support the required behavior for this operation. 建立服務時，基礎結構會由內部呼叫它。It is called internally by the infrastructure when a service is created.

summary.span: 為屬性標記的方法附加屬性功能至 物件。

span.span: Attaches the attribute functionality to the object for the method that the attribute marks.
This method cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您在所有訊息中或針對特定作業檢視、修改或新增自訂延伸。This method allows you to view, modify, or add custom extensions to the client runtime across all messages, or for a specific operation. 請注意，如果是 ，這個方法的實作便是空的。Note that in the case of the , the implementation of this method is empty. 建立服務 Proxy 時，基礎結構會由內部呼叫這個方法。This method is called internally by the infrastructure when a service proxy is created.

summary.span: 確認作業可支援此行為。

span.span: Verifies that the operation can support this behavior.
This method cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以確認作業描述是否足以支援異動流程行為。This method verifies whether the operation description is sufficient to support the transaction flow behavior. 請注意，如果是 ，這個方法的實作便是空的。Note that in the case of the , the implementation of this method is empty. 建立服務時，基礎結構會由內部呼叫這個方法。This method is called internally by the infrastructure when a service is created.
